arabicText: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌۭ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	from	the	outermost	part	of	the	city	
came	a	man	running;	he	said,	“O	my	
people!	Obey	those	who	have	been	sent.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	shahar	ke	parle	kināre	se	aik	mard	
doudtā	āayā	bola	aey	meri	qaum	bheje	
huōñ	ki	pairwi	karo.”

arabicText: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًۭا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
englishTranslationText: “Obey	those	who	do	not	ask	any	fee	from	you,	and	they	are	on	guidance.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aisoñ	ki	pairwi	karo	jo	tum	se	kuchh	Neg	
(ájr)	nahiñ	māñgte	aur	woh	rāh	par	haiñ.

arabicText: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	what	is	the	matter	with	me	that	I	should	not	worship	Him	Who	created	me,	whereas	it	is	
towards	Him	that	you	are	to	return?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	mujhe	kiyā	hai	ke	us	kī	bandagī	na	karoñ	jis	ne	mujhe	paidā	kiyā	aur	usī	kī	ṭaraf	tumheñ	
palatnā	hai.

arabicText: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّۢ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
englishTranslationText:
“What!	Shall	I	appoint	Gods	other	than	Allah?	So	that	if	the	Most	Gracious	should	wish	me	any	
harm,	their	intercession	would	be	of	no	use	to	me,	nor	would	they	be	able	to	save	me?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kiyā	Allāh	ke	siwā	aur	khudā	thahrāōñ	ke	agar	raḥmān	merā	kuch	burā	chāhe	to	un	kī	sifārish	
mere	kuch	kām	na	āaye	aur	na	woh	mujhe	bachā	sakeñ.

englishTranslationText: “Undoubtedly,	I	am	then	in	open	error.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	jab	to	main	khulī	gumrāhī	meiñ	hoñ.

englishTranslationText: “Indeed	I	have	believed	in	your	Lord,	so	heed	me..”
romanUrduTranslationText: Muqarrar	(yaqīnan)	main	tumhāre	Rab	par	Imān	lāyā	to	merī	suno.

arabicText: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText: It	was	said	to	him,	“Enter	Paradise”;	he	said,	“If	only	my	people	knew!”
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	se	farmāyā	gayā	ke	Jannat	meiñ	dākhil	ho	kahā	kisī	ṭaraḥ	merī	qaum	jāntī.

arabicText: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
englishTranslationText: “The	manner	in	which	my	Lord	has	pardoned	me	and	made	me	of	the	honoured	ones!”
romanUrduTranslationText: Jaisī	mere	Rab	ne	merī	maghfirat	kī	aur	mujhe	‘izzat	wāloñ	meiñ	kiyā.
